transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji namaskar sir, JN Handicraft se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji JN Handicraft se bol raha hu.
Executive: Ji ji Sikandar ji IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu Prabhat kaise hai sir aap?
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Ji ji mai keh raha tha sir aapko morning se try kar raha tha aapse baat hi nahi ho pa rahi thi.
Executive: Sir services ke related sir koi issue aa raha tha koi dikkat toh nahi aa rahi services mein?
Customer: Service ke service ke regarding issue aa raha hai. Abhi woh matlab yeh bata rahe the ke bhai iski matlab yeh soch, show chair ka bhi isme bata rahe hai IndiaMART mein. Wapas isko page ko khol ke dikhta hai, dikhta hi nahi hai woh kaha pe hai.
Executive: Accha lead sold out ho jati hai yeh keh rahe hai aap?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Aapka message aata hai IndiaMART se. Ke bhai yeh badhiya lead hai isko aap lo. Toh woh jab woh wohi dikhta hai phir wapas.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Lead kholte hai toh woh nazar hi nahi aata hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap jaise hi lead aaye na turant kharida kijiye. Taki aapko na.
Customer: Mai toh turant khol ke dekhta hu turant mai. Khol ke dekhta hu woh waha se dikhta hi nahi hai waha pe woh.
Executive: Kitni lead aapke saath aisa hua hai?
Customer: Yeh do teen baar ho gaya aisa.
Executive: Theek hai mai usko theek karwata hu sir. Dusra aap na lead ka aane ka wait mat karo daily na buylead ke page pe jaake lead dekhte raho.
Customer: Are yaar nahi koi lead achi aayi nahi rahi sahi baat toh yeh hai. Ab aap log keh rahe ho woh package le lo woh package le lo. Ab humne abhi paise diye yaar aapko shuru mein maine bola tha. Maine kaha dekh lo yeh cheez ho toh mere ko pehle bata do aap.
Executive: Nahi nahi abhi toh aapko nahi mai le raha hu abhi toh.
Customer: Hamare paas business hoga tab hum IndiaMART pe paisa kharch karenge.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul theek baat hai sir.
Customer: Business aa hi nahi raha hum pareshan ho rahe hai waise hi. Waise bhi kaam nahi IndiaMART se humne kyu kaam chalu kiya ke IndiaMART se hume kaam milega. Kaam hi nahi mil raha bilkul IndiaMART se toh.
Executive: Sir thoda sa conversion bhi milega. Thoda sa wait kijiye mai aapke lead ko thoda. Sir rating rating badhaiye apni sir rating aapki kaafi kam hai. Toh rating ko improve kijiye.
Customer: Woh toh mai abhi kal baat karte hai abhi bhai abhi market mein hu. Gaadi hai mere haath mein. Gaadi chala raha hu.
Executive: Nahi nahi pure din sir phone nahi uthate hai sir aap.
Customer: Are mai busy rehta hu abhi yaar waise bhi.
Executive: Toh ek kaam kariye mai aapka na concern mai band kar raha hu. Aap ek kaam mai sara kuch setting wetting theek kar deta hu koi dikkat aati hai mai aapko number diya us pe call kar lijiyega theek hai. Mai aapko.
Customer: Aapne yeh aapne yeh Friday ko apan meeting rakhte hai Friday ko.
Executive: Friday ko?
Customer: Haan Friday ko. Friday bahut late ho jayega sir.
Customer: Are hamare woh shaadi waadi mein idhar uljha hua hu mai. Abhi ghar ke andar shaadi wagera aa rahi hai.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai mai Friday ko aapse ek baar connect kar leta hu tab tak mai isko solve jo bhi issue hai usko bhi solve kara dunga theek hai. But aapse yeh request hai lead aap dekhte rahe lead chodna mat theek hai.
Customer: Are lead toh mai dekhta hi rehta hu yaar lead achi aayegi.
Executive: Achi aayegi aaj se achi aayegi mai bata raha hu na aap lead dekhte raho koi lead chodo mat theek hai. Theek hai.
Executive: Aur aapka sir yeh concern hai mai band kar raha hu sir isko please satisfy kar dena Friday ek video meeting rakhta hu.
Executive: Us par baat karte hai. Kitne baje rakho Friday ko bataiye?
Customer: Friday ko apan rakhenge yeh subah 10 baje ke baad mein. 10 10:30 baje.
Executive: Chalo 10:30 ke 10:30 ka kar deta hu schedule theek hai.
Customer: Okay okay okay.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai sir okay. Thank you. Ek feedback aayega sir please woh kar dena theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads disappear after appearing on IndiaMART.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of leads received.

- Feels money spent on subscription is not worth it.



Resolution:

- Executive will fix the issue of disappearing leads.

- Executive advised to check buylead page daily.

- Executive to schedule a video meeting on Friday.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled for Friday at 10:30 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, technical issue, meeting
